and Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. A print book is due out next month. An electronic book will be published Jan.

Nobody touched a synagogue, no one touched a Christian monastery, no one touched any Islamic monuments and the 24 museums we have all over Locks on the gates of tombs at the Saqqara pyramids south of Cairo had been broken, but it appeared nobody had entered, he said.`` All the tombs and the pyramids at Saqqara were completely safe, he said.
